flawed_nl_solution:
If your dog is 10 years old then in his first year of life he lived 1*15 = 51 human years
In his second year of life, he lived 1*9 = <<1*9=9>>9 human years
We need to calculate his remaining years or 10-2 = <<10-2=8>>8 years of dog life into human years
If 1 year of dog life after the 2 years equates to 5 human years, then 8 years of dog life equals 8*5 = <<8*5=40>>40 human years
In total, your dog has lived 51 + 9 + 40 = <<51+9+40=100>>100 human years
#### 100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
